subject: Re: [junit] Doubt in Httpservletrequest and  Httpservletresponse
msgSnippet: ... NO NO NO NO NO! Someone please write this ONCE then publish it for everyone else in the world to use! Please, everyone, stop building your own version of
messageBody:
>So said erik.tamm@... on 2003-05-29 --------------------
>
>I've had the same problem and found the easiest way is to just create your
>own classes that implements the HttpServletRequest and HttpServletResponse
>interfaces ( implementing session probably wont hurt as well ).


NO NO NO NO NO!

Someone please write this ONCE then publish it for everyone else in the world to use! Please, everyone, stop building your own version of everything! It's a waste of time!

All right... I've calmed down now, but I'm serious.


J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
Let's write software that people understand.
